title: Research Progress-College of Economic and Social Development
content: Relationship between green investments, energy markets, and stock markets in the aftermath of the global financial crisis This study investigates how energy and stock markets affect the dynamics of green stock price returns consid ering recent periods of crises and increased uncertainty. Particularly, following the 21st Conference of the Parties (COP21)-Paris agreement and global financial crisis, it is important to assess the causal relationship between energy market, stock market, and green stock returns.
